snippet: The question of whether China’s departing president, Hu Jintao, will stay on as the top overseer of military affairs, or retire completely, remains unresolved.
abstract: Question of whether departing Chinese Pres Hu Jintao will keep his powerful post as head of military looms as major unresolved issue as Communist Party Congress concludes its sweeping leadership transition (Series: Changing of the Guard).

byline.contributor: Edward Wong and Jonathan Ansfield contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The question of whether China’s departing president, Hu Jintao, will stay on as the top overseer of military affairs, or retire completely, remains unresolved.

headline.seo: Hu Jintao’s Military Role in China Uncertain as Congress Winds Down
headline.main: Signs of Wrangling in China Over Top Military Post
headline.print_headline: Military Role Of Leader In China Still Unclear
